notes.title: Competing interests
notes.p: R.B.-W. and M.R. are coinventors in the pending European patent application EP16720354 (US10421749 patent granted). Applicants: Helmholtz Zentrum München and Leibnitz Institut für Naturstoff-Forschung und Infektionsbiologie e.V. M.R. has served on the Scientific Advisory Board and as consultant of the Helmholtz Zentrum München and received consulting fees.
